title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with a modern, responsive design, built with Next.js and Stripe for payments.

title: Real-time Chat Application
description: A scalable, real-time chat application using WebSockets, Node.js, and Redis for message caching.

title: Cloud-Native Microservices
description: An application demonstrating microservice architecture, deployed on Kubernetes with CI/CD pipelines.

title: Sentiment Analysis API
description: A REST API that performs sentiment analysis on text, built with Python and deployed as a serverless function.

title: AI-Powered Recommendation Engine
description: Built a content recommendation engine using collaborative filtering. Processes user interaction data to suggest relevant articles.

title: Image Recognition Service
description: Developed a microservice for object detection in images using a pre-trained TensorFlow model. Exposed via a REST API.

title: Interactive Data Visualization Dashboard
description: A web-based dashboard for visualizing complex datasets using D3.js and React, providing interactive charts and graphs.
